alert.note: Alert for Butts; Lamar; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Spalding, southwestern Butts and Lamar Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Liberty Hill, or near Barnesville, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, Barnesville, Milner, Orchard Hill, Aldora, East Griffin, Liberty Hill, Goggins, McKibben, Johnstonville, and Chappel Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
